title: LEGO.Indiana.Jones.Duology-R.G.Mechanics

LEGO.Indiana.Jones.Duology-R.G.Mechanics


1.LEGO Indiana Jones: The Original Adventures


Year: 2008 
Genre:   Arcade 
Publication Type: RePack 
Language: RUS | ENG 
Language: Eng 
Crack: RELOADED 

System requirements: 

Operating system: Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7 
Processor: Pentium IV 1.5 GHz or AMD Athlon XP 
Memory: 512 MB 
Video: 256 MB of memory, support for DirectX 9.0 and Shader 3.0 
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX  8c 
Free hard drive space: 6 GB 

 
Family game from LucasArts and TT Games, based on three classic Indiana 
Jones movies - "Raiders of the Lost Ark", "Temple of Doom" and "Last Crusade."
Objective of the project - "to introduce children to the famous archaeologist 
and cheer parents ironic look at the tapes of their favorite youth." 
Exit the game, which was developed by do not yet exist at the time the constructor 
sets LEGO, timed to coincide with the premiere of the fourth film about the 
adventures of Indiana Jones.
 
2.LEGO Indiana Jones 2: The Adventure Continues


Year: 2009 
Genre:   Arcade 
Publication Type: RePack 
Language: RUS | ENG 
Language: Eng
Crack: Razor1911 

System requirements: 

Operating system: Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7 
Processor: Pentium IV 1,8 GHz or equivalent 
Memory: 512 MB 
Video: 256 MB of memory, support for DirectX 9.0 and Shader 3.0 
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX  8c 
Free space on hard disk: 7.5 GB 

 
Computer game about the adventures of Indiana Jones sends a player into a great 
and wonderful world of LEGO, where he was waiting for an exciting adventure in 
the company of the legendary movie hero and his brave friends. At the beginning 
of the game is available only one set - "Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the 
Crystal Skull", but as the assignments will be new interesting possibilities. 
Players can not only discover new levels, but also to create their own, 
acquire a variety of characters and make round the world itineraries, 
traveling to Indiana Jones meet with enormous dangers.
 
Features repack:

LEGO Indiana Jones: The Original Adventures 
Do not cut / recoded 

LEGO Indiana Jones 2: The Adventure Continues 
Do not cut / recoded
